body: Electronic devices and characteristics, amplifiers and feedback, electronic instruments and recording systems. Designed for non-electrical engineering students.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: PHYS 212)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: EE 212: Introduction to Electronic Measuring Systems
